Burning Hammer is happy to have Recon on his side, a guy like him would be
very useful. The arrow stuck throguh Burning Hammer's chest with a crack.

Burning Hammer: Assassins are people, too! Doesn't the Maximals have
assassins that are designed to kill Predacons, anyway? Of course they do!
Say your prayers, Predacon!

Burning Hammer takes the arrow out, but mech fluid starts flowing freely, so
he puts it back in. Burning Hammer fires a single missile at Aerotaur...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, March 09, 2001 3:39 PM
Subject: Re: Chivtrons' base


> ::Aerotaur::
>      "You are listening to an assassin!  He came to kill a young child who
isn't even here.  We faught to defend the Maximal base!"  As he spots the
tree he alters to his bird mode and takes to the air.  The tree passes below
his legs and crashes into the base wall above the door.  He lands again and
returns to his winged centaur mode.  He once again loads an arrow but this
time fires it at Burning Hammer.  He can't hurt Recon because he isn't the
enemy.
>
